derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting spiritual insight or immediate spiritual communication): from late Latin intuitio(n-), from Latin intueri 'consider' (see intuit)

encyclopedia.content: Intuition 演唱者 ：Jewel 中文名： 珠儿 歌曲长度：3分55秒 歌词 Im just a simple girl In a high-tech digital world I really try 2 understand]All the powers that rule this land They say Ms. Js big butt is boss Kate Moss cant find a job In a world of postmodern fad What was good now is bad Its not hard 2 understand Just follow this simple plan CHORUS Follow your heart Your intuition It will lead u in

entry.def: Your intuition or your intuitions are unexplained feelings you have that something is true even when you have no evidence or proof of it.

example.ex: Her intuition was telling her that something was wrong...
example.tran: 她的直觉告诉她一定出了什么问题。

example.ex: You can't make a case on your intuitions, Phil.
example.tran: 菲尔,你不能凭直觉来作出解释。

means.word_mean: 1. instinctive knowing (without the use of rational processes)
2. an impression that something might be the case;

sentences.sentence: "he had an intuition that something had gone wrong"
